item.description:
Hi Ladies!

By popular demand I am scheduling our next meet-up at the Summer Shack in Hingham. It seems like many of you liked this idea and I am always open for suggestions!

I am not sure what to expect in terms of how busy the bar will be (I assume it may be pretty crazy on a Friday night). I will need rsvp's as soon as possible as they do use OpenTable for online reservations but I can imagine how packed they may get.

Also, if you haven't paid the $3.00 member dues please do so as soon as you are able:-)

Thanks and looking forward to seeing everyone!

Lisa
item.how_to_find_us: I will be waiting at the bar once checked in. As the date nears and we have a better idea of the numbers, I can send out a message about the game plan.
item.name: Cocktails at Summer Shack at Derby St in Hingham
